tagline: The home of brilliant Media Planning & Buying
description:
We are a fully integrated media planning and buying agency based in Mumbai. We craft integrated media advertising campaigns from concept to completion of a vast range of clientele from different sectors.  
With an end-to-end service, we’re best in research, insight and planning at the start of a campaign, extended through to comprehensive implementation and management, and ending with bespoke post-campaign analysis and insight at the conclusion of the activity.
